content.title: Intro
content.content: -va (plural -vë, from archaic -vai[1]) is a possessive suffix in Quenya.

content.title: Example
content.content: Mindon Eldaliéva = "Lofty Tower of the Eldar"[2]

content.title: References
content.content:
↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, Christopher Tolkien (ed.), The War of the Jewels, "Part Four. Quendi and Eldar", p. 407
↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, Christopher Tolkien (ed.), The Silmarillion, "Index of Names", entry "Mindon Eldaliéva"
